participant_1.background: i produce music for artists. my pets name is charlie. my favourite food is pizza. i listen to rap music. i drive a 2015 honda civic.

participant_2.background: eating is something i do when i'm bored. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. two dogs live with me.

content.text: So, how are things? Are you actually there?
